name: Space Train Trader
description:
Welcome to Space Train Trader! You command a Space Train that can collect and deliver cargo for credits. However, you, the train driver, has some massive debt.  How many credits can you get in 10 days, is it enough?

Controls:

- arrow keys/wasd keys to move.

- Spacebar to eject cargo

- E to sell cargo

Made during GMTK2021
